Naming conventions by NWR:
- Workspace : CAPITAL_WITH_UNDERSCORE
- Sub folder : lowercase with space
- Special folder : _underscore_begins_and_with_underscore
- Code file name : CamelCase.extension
- Common file name : lowercase_with_underscore.extension
- Special file name : _underscore_begins_with_underscore.extension
- Class : CamelCase
- Variabel : snake_case
- Unused variabel : _
- Special variable : _underscore_begins
- Constant : UPPERCASE_WITH_UNDERSCORE

folder in my sourcecode:
- src
- images
- videos
- data
- resources
- models
- run
- assets
- .vscode
- .venv
